title: Don't Believe The Hype - The Intel NUC 9 Is Probably NOT For You!
description: The Intel NUC 9 Extreme is an odd concept.  The NUC 9 Element cards will be expensive when they're released, airflow is terrible and older mobile CPUs are being used.  But there may actually be some use for the NUC 9 Extreme.   Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Thermaltake ToughRAM -   Subscribe    This video is sponsored by Thermaltake. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #nuc9 #ghostcanyonnuc #hardwarecanucks
